_meanings:
{@--1@} To walk off, go or
get away, depart; {#apasara itaH#} begone,
avaunt, hence, get you gone;  
{#apasarAgrataH#} <ls>Pt. 1.</ls>

To make (a thing or
person) go away or retire, take or
put away, remove, drive away or
off, throw aside; {#apasAraya GanasAraM#}
<ls>K. P. 9</ls>; {#apasAryatAM vetralatA#} <ls>Pt. 1</ls>
put aside, take away; <ls>Ms. 7. 149.</ls>
